copyBlock.copy: When the winters get tough, the Cub Cadet<sup>®</sup> 2X gets tougher. Two-stage snow blowers are engineered for clearing between 12-18 inches of powder and slush. If you measure snow in feet instead of inches, step up to the commercial-grade 2X MAX™ trim package to help tackle the deep stuff.

blocks.title: Snowfall
blocks.copy:
Up to 18"
(18–23" for EFI and MAX™ units)

options.title: Take on Winter with Your Choice of Trim Options

blocks.title: EFI
blocks.copy: Allows for easy starting in most conditions—no need to prime. Maintain steady walking speed through heavy snow conditions.

blocks.title: Intellipower
blocks.copy: IntelliPower<sup>™</sup> engine technology is designed to deliver consistent power in heavy and wet snow conditions.

blocks.title: TRAC
blocks.copy: TRAC drive is designed to provide steady traction in extreme weather conditions.

blocks.title: MAX
blocks.copy: Commercial-grade features provide quality, durability and reliability.

quote.title: Beefy, high-performing unit
quote.copy: I bought this the day before a snow storm in New England. …I wasn’t sure what to expect. However, 12-14 inches of wet, heavy snow proved to be a cake walk for this haus. It threw the slushy mess a good 25-30ft on 3/4 throttle.
quote.name: baylor0205 from Connecticut

blocks.title: Discover power that rises to the occasion.
blocks.copy: Intellipower™ technology provides up to 13% more available power for the 272cc engine, resulting in less bogging down when clearing heavy, wet and deep snow.*
blocks.tag: <sup>*</sup>When compared to the same engine without IntelliPower<sup>™</sup> technology. Improvements vary depending on engine models and specific operating conditions.

blocks.title: Cub Cadet electronic fuel-injected (EFI) engines set new standards in strength and power. EFI provides reliable starting in most conditions.
blocks.copy: Available with IntelliPower<sup>™</sup> engine technology to take on heavy, deep and wet snow conditions.

button.copy: Learn more about cub cadet engine innovation

machineExtreme.copy: All Cub Cadet X Series models come with premium features to get your winter done right.

blocks.title: Comfortable and Convenient Handling
blocks.copy: Power steering at your fingertips while heated hand grips help provide comfort.
blocks.small: Heated hand grips on select models.

blocks.title: Push-button electric start
blocks.copy: Eliminate pull starts and get to blowing snow quickly with push-button electric start.

blocks.title: MAXIMIZE VISIBILITY
blocks.copy: For visibility at dawn or dusk, with an in-dash LED headlight that comes standard.

blocks.title: Easy Maneuverability
blocks.copy: Zero-turn capability while 16-inch X-Trac® tires help provide strong traction.
blocks.small: Tires available on select models only. XTrac is a registered trademark owned by The Carlstar Group LLC.

ctaBlock.h1: Not sure the 2X is for you?
ctaBlock.copy: Our technicians have prepared 8 questions for you in order to find your perfect snow blower.

blocks.title: Snow Blower Safety Tips
blocks.copy: Snow blowers, often referred to as snow blowers are an easy way to keep the snow off your driveway during the winter months. Like any piece of power equipment, snow blower safety should be a top priority…

blocks.title: Recommended Snow Blower Back-Up Parts
blocks.copy: Always prepare your snow blower for maintenance before starting any repairs. Move your snow blower to a flat surface.  Turn the engine off and let it cool. Disconnect the spark plug ignition wire and remove the safety ignition key to prevent accidental starting of the engine…

blocks.title: How to Prepare Your Snow Thrower for Winter Use
blocks.copy: Whether you're prepping your trusty 2X two-stage snow thrower for yet another winter, or getting your new 3X three-stage snow thrower ready to face its first blizzard, these snow thrower maintenance tips can help ensure you're prepared for cold and stormy weather this…

blocks.title: The Benefits of IntelliPower<sup>™</sup> Technology & Electronic Fuel Injection for Snow Blowers
blocks.copy: Cub Cadet<sup>®</sup> snow blowers are engineered for extreme. The 2X<sup>®</sup> 30 EFI with IntelliPower<sup>™</sup> combines two technologies — IntelliPower and Electronic Fuel Injection (EFI) — to give you a powerful combination and help handle whatever winter has to offer…

blocks.title: Identifying the right snow blower specifications
blocks.copy: A snow blower is a significant investment, so you want to make sure that you’re getting a machine that suits your needs. The Cub Cadet® X-Series has a snow blower for many different extremes, but you first need to identify what your…

blocks.title: Cub Cadet Snow Blower Buyers Guide
blocks.copy: If you live in areas where snowfall is frequent or heavy, shoveling becomes part of your daily routine. Ditching your shovel, along with the heavy lifting and repetitive strain that comes with shoveling snow, in favor of a snow blower can save you time and energy. A couple of reasons to justify a snow blower…
